thread.title: Great location, great staff
thread.title_full: Great location, great staff - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: FrankandJane_30
title: Great location, great staff
text: Hotel is conveniently located a few steps from the Tower Hill district line tube stop and the Tower of London. There are plenty of restaurants, pubs and coffee shops nearby. The room was modern, spacious and clean. The bathroom was equally spacious and bright with a large shower and tub. Bedding and linens were crisp and clean. Hotel staff were excellent the door men were prompt and helpful. We used the underground to get to and from Heathrow. It is about an hour trip (depending on time of day) with a transfer at Earl's Court (Piccadilly line to district line)
